bug.author: edenbuaa
bug.summary: [Bug] Full log is unavailable in v14 version
bug.description:
PAI Version: v0.14.0 WebPortal: <denchmark-link:http://master-ip/>http://master-ip/</denchmark-link>
It seems that the full log href link is wrong on the job detail page, it links to http://master-ip/node/containerlogs/container_e04_1568009317169_1075_01_000002/user/user.pai.stdout/?start=0 but this page shows: {"message": "Page not found", "error":{}} how to fix it? thanks.

comments.comment: Yes, we have the same problem.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/IamSunGuangzhi>@IamSunGuangzhi</denchmark-link> - thanks for reporting the issue, this is a known issue in 0.14.0, we had fixed it in later branch. To walk around the issue you can use the "..." after "Stderr", click "Go to Tracking Page" and then click the full log link there.
let me know if the walk around works for you, I will close the issue accordingly, thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/IamSunGuangzhi>@IamSunGuangzhi</denchmark-link> =).
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/scarlett2018>@scarlett2018</denchmark-link> Do you mean this bug could been fixed if I pull the latest codes of v14 branch and rebuild the webportal image?

The fix might still in dev's personal branch, we did not plan to merge for another release yet.
@sunqinzheng to confirm @edenbuaa 's question.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/scarlett2018>@scarlett2018</denchmark-link> Thanks. This way works for me. You can close the issue.
